model
Class Model

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      model.Model

public class Model
extends Observable

The model stores all data and provides it for the view and controllers. Also, the model is the only class to access the database, and does so by employing DatabaseFunctions objects to retrieve and set data. Holds a reference to the current profile used, which references all accounts and friends. Also references conversation data to provide the GUI with the current active conversation to display.

findUserByAccountName

public UserData findUserByAccountName(String accountName)
Searches for a friend in all the accounts of the current profile by account name.

Parameters:
accountName - The String representing the account name.
Returns:
A UserData with the friend info. Can be null if the friend is not found.

addFriend

public void addFriend(ServerType server,
                      String accountName)
Adds a friend to the friend list. Takes a server type and a String representing the account name as parameters. Searches the accounts for a matching server, creates a new UserData, and adds this UserData to the account.

Parameters:
server - A constant representing the server type to search for in accounts. This parameter effectively specifies which account to add the friend to.
accountName - A string with the account name of the user to add. This method is responsible to place this user into a UserData object.

addFriend

public void addFriend(AccountData account,
                      UserData userToAdd)
Overloaded version of addFriend. Takes a UserData instead of a String representing a friend.

Parameters:
account - The account to add the friend to.
userToAdd - The new UserData friend to add to the account.

removeFriend

public boolean removeFriend(UserData exFriend)
Removes a friend in one of the accounts based on the UserData representation of the friend. Removes only the first friend that is found. It is advisable to run a findFriendByAccountName() first to obtain the UserData representation, and then call this method to remove the friend.

Parameters:
exFriend - The friend to remove.
Returns:
true if removed, false otherwise.

findAccountByFriend

Searches for an account that matches with the passed in UserData representation of a friend.

Parameters:
userToBeFound -
Returns:

changeFriendStatus

public void changeFriendStatus(UserData friend,
                               String status)
Updates a friend's status, and notifies the BUDDY portion of the view on the change. Requires a UserData object to be passed in. In practice, this model method is not required to change the status, but it is important to do so as to update the view.

Parameters:
friend - The UserData representation of the friend.
status - The new status message to display.

blockFriend

public void blockFriend(UserData friend)
Blocks a user and updates the view.

Parameters:
friend - UserData representation of the friend to block.

unblockFriend

public void unblockFriend(UserData friend)
Unblocks a user and updates the view.

Parameters:
friend - UserData representation of the friend to unblock.
